message_text: “Hi Jane 😛 .. in all honesty im very broken.. and ik im sorry i havent been telling you things like i trust u so much. But with this i just havent been able to talk to you or anyone about the sad shit thats been happening in my life... dont respond to this just read it 😛 what ive been avoiding on telling people who care about me in my life... the truth is everythings breaking... just this last weekend... everything got worse... and remember how my dad found out about qihong... guess thats when it started i kept pushing away my problems to the back of my mind but i finally talked to him about it so... i guess its my fault but we are on a break but tbh i dont see us getting back together since i ruined a lot of things.. to add on my uncle is still in a coma in the hospital.. my parents are fighting and my dad is threatening divorce... and just the overall stress of school is killing me mentally... even now i havent been able to di my policy paper... this whole day i just wandered into my classes and i couldnt focus at all. Yesterday i spent my whole day sulking... but the problem is i cant talk to my family... the stress of having to put on thei happy mask everyday is getting to me and im truely breaking and i have no way of stopping this crash... im sorry i havent been telling u much going in ny life but with u, i just always saw an escape from reality... being with u everytime im able to joke around and laugh but idk anymore. Thank you for being here for me but yea i just needed to get this out. You really dont have to worry about me but i probably wont ever really be the same.. 😛 ik its stupid but life honestly just sucks rn... whelp time to attempt to start my policy paper, nightt”
context_prev: 578391|them|well i told her not to respond || 578337|them|here ill just send u what i sent to her so you have a grasp of whats going on with me :PP
context_next: 578472|them|super long sorry 😛 || 578408|me|When is the policy paper due?
gold_notes: going through crisis: relationship break, uncle in coma, parents fighting/divorce, school stress, depression
